item.title: 5 + 1 tips for new IntelliJ IDEA users
item.author: Author
item.description: Why IDEA? It seems like a lot of people have migrated to IntelliJ IDEA over the years. As a long time IDEA user I can attest there are many reasons for that. So if you’re willing to make the jump here are some tips to ease your life. Of course your mileage may vary, and you don’t necessarily need to agree with my opinions. That’s completely fine. ðŸ˜‰ Import Maven Projects like a Pro Update I have it on good authority that while there are differences in how projects get imported, you should not have any problems regardles of how you do it.
